Summary: Bright object in sky travelling silent at speed
trends: There have been no other sightings in Great Yarmouth
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailswhilst walking home from a charity shop where i work, i turned on to my street as usual walked a few yards on to my street and just happened to look up at the night sky, where i saw a star like object moving across the sky, there was no sound and no aircraft running lights i.e red\ blue or red\ green. i'm quite open minded about these things so i thought is this an experimental aircraft\ a satellite or a chinese lantern balloon. object travelled in a straight line so i could be making something of this that it is not, all i remember thinking was "holy ****", this is when i noticed it was there long enough to get out my smart-phone and try to get it on film(see attached file), sight was lost as it went behind a building. this could be anything, i just need to know if this is real or something of this planet!
